channel.title: Exercises: Strings :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Part One The length method returns how many characters are in a string. However, the method will NOT give us the length of a number. If num = 1001, num.length returns undefined rather than 4. Use type conversion to print the length (number of digits) of an integer. Print the number of digits in a DECIMAL value (e.g. num = 123.45 has 5 digits but a length of 6).
